body:
Could you please dump the output of ```ldd bitcoin-qt``` as well as ```readelf -d bitcoin-qt``` ?

Looks like the Fontconfig abi might've changed :\

```
user@ubuntu:~/Desktop$ ldd ./bitcoin-qt 
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007ffef759f000)
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f8e3a444000)
	libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007f8e3a240000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f8e39f3a000)
	libfontconfig.so.1 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libfontconfig.so.1 (0x00007f8e39cfd000)
	libfreetype.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libfreetype.so.6 (0x00007f8e39a5a000)
	libX11-xcb.so.1 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11-xcb.so.1 (0x00007f8e39858000)
	libX11.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so.6 (0x00007f8e39522000)
	libxcb.so.1 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libxcb.so.1 (0x00007f8e39303000)
	librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007f8e390fb000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f8e38ee4000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f8e38b1b000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x000055f422e5b000)
	libexpat.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libexpat.so.1 (0x00007f8e388f1000)
	libz.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libz.so.1 (0x00007f8e386d7000)
	libpng12.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpng12.so.0 (0x00007f8e384b1000)
	libXau.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXau.so.6 (0x00007f8e382ad000)
	libXdmcp.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXdmcp.so.6 (0x00007f8e380a6000)
```
